apps.name: Indigo
apps.description: Rapid InDel Discovery in Sanger Chromatograms.

apps.name: maze
apps.description: Visually align sequences using exact matches.

apps.name: Primer3Plus
apps.description: Pick primers from a DNA sequence.

apps.name: Wily-DNA-Editor
apps.description: Edit DNA sequences, reverse-complement and do restriction digests.

apps.name: Silica
apps.description: In-silico PCR amplification on complete genomes.

apps.name: bistro
apps.description: Visualize the per-position base distribution across multiple DNA sequences.

apps.name: halo
apps.description: Browse haplotype-resolved data, such as Strand-seq.

apps.name: Pearl
apps.description: Assemble trace files with an optional reference sequence.

apps.name: padlock
apps.description: Padlock probe design for in-situ sequencing.

apps.name: Salt
apps.description: Affine gap local and banded global alignment for two DNA sequences.
